snippet: On “Morning Joe,” Mr. Johnson, the Libertarian Party candidate, indicated that he really was not aware of the Syrian city engulfed in civil war....
abstract: Libertarian Party presidential nominee Gary Johnson shows startling lack of foreign policy knowledge, asking 'what is Aleppo?' in response to interview question about Syrian refugee crisis; gaff could imperil his campaign as he works to gain enough support to be included in presidential debates.
lead_paragraph: On “Morning Joe,” Mr. Johnson, the Libertarian Party candidate, indicated that he really was not aware of the Syrian city engulfed in civil war.

headline.main: ‘What Is Aleppo?’ Gary Johnson Asks, in an Interview Stumble
headline.print_headline: ‘What Is Aleppo?’ Libertarian Presidential Candidate Asks in an Interview Stumble
